entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • .editorconfig code analysis suppressions not always honored #62064
  • TryCalculateRequiredMembers throws exceptions if there's duplicate required members #62062
  • Feature xxx is currently unavailable due to an internal error- The JSON-RPC connection with the remote party was lost before the request could complete. #62059
  • Remove TryGetUnmatchedInParameterAndFreeMatchedArgs() if not needed #62054
  • Incomplete record inheritance syntax produces a lot of nonsense compiler errors #62051
  • Support `scoped` modifier for other local declarations #62039

Closed

  • Remove DebuggerContractVersionCheck #56742
    17.3
  • `FadeOutComplexCollectionInitialization` is not initialized nor read #61859
  • `PreferSystemHashCode` is not set #61857
  • Generic methods with same name but different type #62052
  • New public APIs for Unsigned Right Shift #61854
  • Copilot 安装 #62050
  • Copilot #62049
  • VS2022 Quick action to Convert to file scope for the whole project/solution is not available. #62018
    Next

PullRequests

Created

  • Adjust caching logic when a `NodeStateTable` is empty #62068
    Area-Compilers
  • Add syntax only provider #62067
    Area-Compilers
  • Improve the experience of completion around required members #62065
    Area-IDE
  • Use the AzDO Agent's copy of git #62061
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Remove unused value assignment lambda capture case #62057
    Area-IDE
  • Revert "Merge pull request #61669 from jasonmalinowski/log-aggregator… #62056
    Area-IDE
  • Revert "Merge pull request #61840 from DoctorKrolic/async-suggestions… #62055
    Area-IDE
  • Use VisualStudioWorkspaceImpl to perform navigation for Inheritance margin #62053
    Area-IDE
  • Add Integration tests for Inheritance margin #62047
    Area-IDE
  • Merge release/dev17.1 to release/dev17.2 #62045
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Cover additional cases where nullable directives can be removed #62043
    Area-IDE
  • Remove unnecessary nullable directives #62037
    Area-Compilers

Merged

  • Merge main into features/ref-fields #62063
    Area-Compilers
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #62066
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Filter symbol first before creating InheritanceMargin target #61911
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Implement concatenation operator for "u8" literals. #62044
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Utf8StringLiterals, Next
  • Global options tests #61872
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Add NFW report to FindRefs to help track down an issue. #62058
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #62060
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Add nuget reference to fix ide benchmarks #62026
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #62048
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Add analyzers to unnecessary nullable directives #62004
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Separate IEditorConfigOptionMappingService from IGlobalOptionService #61899
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #62046
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Remove more delegates from FindRefs. #62027
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Add FixAll support for ConvertNamespace refactoring #62019
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #62038
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.0-vs-deps to release/dev17.1 #62042
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev16.11-vs-deps to release/dev17.0-vs-deps #62041
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Create VS insertions after artifacts have been published. #62040
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Document Outline Feature #61784
    Area-IDE
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #62069
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Ref fields escape analysis #61195
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • changes needed to build Roslyn.sln on unix #61959
  • Inheritance completions massive improvement #62013
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Read syntax tree, source text and options synchronously in command handlers #62002
    Area-IDE
  • Add correctness check that only runs analyzers #62035
    Area-IDE
  • [EnC] Allow deleting method #61806
    Area-Compilers
  • New hot reload interfaces #60219
    Area-Interactive
  • Integrate generator times into /reportAnalyzer #61661
    Area-Compilers
  • File types emit #61646
    Area-Compilers
  • Add `CompilerGeneratedAttribute` to `EqualityContract` property #61993
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Revert "Merge pull request #61862 #62033
    Area-IDE
  • Record added node output states as new #61575
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • IOperation: expose information about the type parameter that is going to be used as the ".constrained" type for invoking abstract static methods #61811
    Concept-API, Area-Compilers, New Feature - StaticAbstractMembersInInterfaces
  • Detect ref assemblies in rebuild #59491
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Highlight the search term in the options page #61301
    Area-IDE
  • Revert "[LSP] Add support for reporting project level diagnostics in … #62031
    Area-IDE
